general_advisory: Due to Forecast of Light to Moderate rainfall from 7th Sept. Farmers are advised to don't apply fertilizer & chemical during this period.

advisory: After rain, go for applying Nitrogen @ 12-16 kg/acre as per the variety.
After rain there is chances of mealy bug attack, to manage this spray Dimethoate @ 2 ml/liter of water.
Maintain 2 inches of water till grand growth stage. Go for regular survey of the crop for any insect pest infestation.
After rain, go for intercultivation and top dress with 12 kg Nitrogen/ac.

In upland, go for sowing sesamum. Good varieties are Amrit, GT 10, Kanak, Kalika, Prachi @ 2-3 kg/acre. Go for line sowing at spacing 30 cm X 10 cm. At final land preparation, apply basal fertilizer dose @ 6 kg Nitrogen, 8 kg Phosphorus, and 8 kg potas per acre.
Due to weather there is chances of Aphids in Maize, to manage this, apply Dimethoate @ 2 ml/liter of water.
Due to weather Leaf blight disease is seen, to manage this spray Mancozeb @ 4 ml/liter of water.
Keep provision of drainage of excess water.
Provide staking to the newly planted saplings to avoid from wind damage. Go for intercropping with pulses in newly developed orchard.
Due to weather there is chances of Brinjal Fruit & Shoot Borer attack, to manage this apply T. chilonis @ 20000 per acre.
After rainfall, drench Carbendazim or Mancozeb @ 2 g/l of water near the root zone to avoid any type of fungal diseases.
Provide regular feeding @ 0.35% of body mass.
Provide mineral mixture to increase milk productivity in animals.
